Home Page

Click on one of the 3 preview songs, or Start in the navigation bar to get started
Hovering your mouse over a panel with a 🔊 emoji will play a 30 second preview of the song

Start Page

Cycle through random songs from Spotify, and tell SongTaste whether you Like or Dislike a song
After 5 songs, SongTaste's Deep Learning API will begin to predict whether you'll like the next song, learning with every decision
After 9 liked songs, Click the Automate button (will require you to log into Spotify [free]) to create a playlist in your Spotify library filled with Spotify's recommendations based on your SongTaste profile
